channel.title: New Episode of The Gauntlet Podcast: Storm Riders!, The Dark Between the Stars, Threadbare, and The Veil: Inheritance
channel.description:
In the newest episode of The Gauntlet Podcast, Lowell & Sherri are joined by Fraser Simons to discuss Storm Riders!, The Dark Between the Stars, and Threadbare. The guest segment is all about The Veil: Inheritance, coming soon to KS.
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/storm-riders-the-dark-between-the-stars-threadbare-the-veil-inheritance

item.title: New Episode of The Gauntlet Podcast: Storm Riders!, The Dark Between the Stars, Threadbare, and The Veil: Inheritance

item.description:
@jasoncordova wrote:

In the newest episode of The Gauntlet Podcast, Lowell & Sherri are joined by Fraser Simons to discuss Storm Riders!, The Dark Between the Stars, and Threadbare. The guest segment is all about The Veil: Inheritance, coming soon to KS.
